title: Sunrise From an Icy Heart
description:
Do you want to overcome betrayal, grief, and/or manage a chronic health condition, and find fulfilling love?   
  SUNRISE FROM AN ICY HEART: A MEMOIR will take you on a discovery of the human need to find a special kind of love, raise loving sons and rise above the strangling odds that face immigrants. 
Alexander chronicles her transformational journey into womanhood from age 22 to 59.A story of survival and determination, from St. Lucia to Canada through a midst of rejections, abandonment and the power to smash through the fence of fear and fly.A sensual, amusing, and fun read that will stimulate your senses, make you laugh, cry and learn some essential life lessons.This book is intended for mature readers. .
Scroll up and grab a copy today.
author: Claudette Alexander
